Action.author: stevetolman
Action.body: Please explain why this is important. What are we missing by not having this test? How risky is it not to have? These answers will help us better prioritize the ticket.

Action.author: spivachuk
Action.body: ~stevetolman , {{testMultipleInstanceChangeMsgsMarkNodeAsSuspicious}} must verify that if some node in a pool sends {{INSTANCE_CHANGE}} messages to other nodes too frequently then they blacklist this node. There are no other tests relying on this feature. This feature has not been implemented yet. I think that implementation of this feature and the test checking it may be scheduled for the time after Minimal Go-Live.

Action.author: krw910
Action.body: ~spivachuk lets eliminate this test and write a new one once the feature is implemented.

Action.author: ashcherbakov
Action.body: The test is not relevant anymore. We should accept frequent Instance Changes
